channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Elon Musk PAC thanks Trump for 'saving the American Dream' in new million-dollar ad
item.description: A PAC founded by billionaire X owner and Tesla CEO Elon Musk is going up on the national airwaves for the first time, thanking President Donald Trump.

item.title: Anyone Who Calls A Man A Woman Immediately Erases His Own Credibility
item.description: We are in a civilizational moment where we must all resolve to reject, without apology or explanation, this deception in every form.

item.title: The Smartest Thing I Ever Did: Women on Life-Changing Decisions

item.title: ISIS-K member confessed to scouting Abbey Gate attack route, training Moscow attackers: affidavit
